title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning

jump_scares.spoiler: An apparently unconscious woman suddenly screams
The sheriff turns around and is suddenly shot in the face
Chrissie turns around and is startled by a biker standing right by the door
A loud gunshot may startle some viewers
A man sticks his hand through a hole in the car above Chrissie
Hoyt suddenly appears at the car window as Eric attempts to escape
A foot appears in front of Chrissie as she tries to crawl out from underneath the car
Hoyt appears in front of Eric with some plastic wrap
A stone block breaks a window
Bailey is stabbed in the chest as she drives away
Luda Mae appears in front of Chrissie
Chrissie sees Hoyt standing on the other side of the window
Hoyt comes into view behind Chrissie
As Chrissie runs towards the door, Hoyt blocks her passage
Hoyt opens the door and is attacked by Dean
Chrissie looks out a window and sees Leatherface on the other side
Leatherface appears in the back seat
